Attributes.description: Evaluation of investment in real estate assets; proforma analysis, property and asset management, equity securitization, appraisal, and international real estate investment.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of COMM 295, ECON 201, ECON 301 and one of COMM 297, COMM 298.
